label: Invoice sent
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Invoice Sent: {{COMPANY_NAME}} - {{INVOICE_NUMBER}}
content:
Hello {{USER_NAME}},

I hope you’re well! Please see attached Invoice for {{INVOICE_FOR}}. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Amount: {{INVOICE_TOTAL}}

Bank Details: 
Bank: XXXXXXX
Account: XXXXXXXXX
Name: XXXXXX
IFSC: XXXXXX
SWIFT: XXXXXXX
Thank you for your business! 

Kind regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: Signup
subject: Welcome to {{APP_NAME}} - Your Subscription Details
content:
Dear {{USER_FIRST_NAME}},

Thank you for choosing {{APP_NAME}}! We are thrilled to have you as a valued member of our community. As promised, here are the details of your subscription plan:

Plan: {{PLAN}}
Price: {{PLAN_PRICE}}
Billing Cycle: {{BILLING_CYCLE}}

With this plan, you'll have access to a wide range of exciting features, exclusive content, and premium benefits. We're confident that you'll find great value and enjoy a seamless experience throughout your subscription.

If you have any questions or need assistance regarding your subscription, our dedicated support team is here to help. Feel free to reach out to us at {{SUPPORT_EMAIL}}.

Once again, welcome to {{APP_NAME}}! We can't wait to see what you'll achieve with us.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: Subscription cancel
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Subscription Cancellation Notification - Your Subscription Has Canceled
content:
Dear {{USER_FIRST_NAME}},

We are sorry to see you go, but we've received your subscription cancellation request. Here are the details:

Plan: {{PLAN}}
Cancellation Date: {{ENDS_AT}}

If you've changed your mind and would like to reactivate your subscription, you can do so by clicking the following button:

Resume Subscription

If you have any questions or need assistance regarding your subscription, our dedicated support team is here to help. Feel free to reach out to us at {{SUPPORT_EMAIL}}.
Thank you for being a part of our service. We hope to see you again soon!

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: Subscription canceled
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Subscription Cancellation Notification - Your Subscription Has Canceled
content:
Dear {{USER_FIRST_NAME}},

We wanted to notify you that your subscription with us has canceled as of {{ENDS_AT}}.

Plan: {{PLAN}}
Price: {{PLAN_PRICE}}
Billing Cycle: {{BILLING_CYCLE}}
Expiration Date: {{ENDS_AT}}
 
As your subscription has ended, you will no longer have access to our premium features and services. We hope you've enjoyed your experience with us during your subscription period.

To renew your subscription and continue enjoying our premium offerings, please click the button below:

Renew Subscription

If you have any questions or need assistance regarding your subscription, our dedicated support team is here to help. Feel free to reach out to us at {{SUPPORT_EMAIL}}.

Thank you for being a part of our service. We hope to see you again soon!

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

{{APP_NAME}}

label: Subscription renewed
subject: Your Subscription Has Been Successfully Renewed!
content:
Dear {{USER_FIRST_NAME}},

We are delighted to inform you that your subscription with us has been successfully renewed.

Plan:{{PLAN}}
Price:{{PLAN_PRICE}}
Billing Cycle:{{BILLING_CYCLE}}
Next Billing Date:{{NEXT_BILLING_DATE}}

Thank you for your continued trust in our services. Your renewed subscription ensures uninterrupted access to our premium features and services, allowing you to continue enjoying all the benefits our platform offers.

If you have any questions or need assistance regarding your subscription, please do not hesitate to reach out to our dedicated support team at {{SUPPORT_EMAIL}}. We are always here to help.

Thank you for being a valued member of our community. We look forward to continuing to serve you.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: Enquiry Notification
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Enquiry #{{ENQUIRY_ID}} - {{ENQUIRY_SUBJECT}}
content:
Hi {{USER_FIRST_NAME}},

{{ENQUIRY_MESSAGE}}
Reply Now
{{ENQUIRY_ATTACHMENTS}}

Regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

If you're having trouble clicking the "Reply Now" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: {{ENQUIRY_URL}}

Please don't respond to this email, any response should be using admin portal.

label: Enquiry Confirmation
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Enquiry #{{ENQUIRY_ID}} - Enquiry Confirmation
content:
Hi {{USER_FIRST_NAME}},

We appreciate that you’ve taken the time to write us. Please wait for a while, our expert team will contact you soon.

Thank you for using our portal!

Regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: Enquiry Update Notification
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Enquiry #{{ENQUIRY_ID}} - {{ENQUIRY_SUBJECT}} has a new update
content:
Hi {{USER_FIRST_NAME}}

We thought you’d like to know that an update has been made to your ticket {{ENQUIRY_ID}} - {{ENQUIRY_SUBJECT}}.

 
--- Ticket Update ---
{{ENQUIRY_REPLY_MESSAGE}}

 
Please take a look at the update and respond here, or by logging into your account and choosing ‘Enquiries’.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: [Admin] Subscription expired
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Subscription Expired for {{USER_NAME}}
content:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to inform you that a member's subscription has been expired. Here are the details:

Member Name: {{USER_NAME}}
Member ID: {{USER_ID}}
Member Email: {{USER_EMAIL}}
Member Phone: {{USER_PHONE_NUMBER}}
 
Please update the member's status in our system accordingly and ensure that they have full access to the facilities and services. It is essential to provide them with a smooth transition back into their regular membership privileges.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to inform you that the hold placed on a member's subscription has been released, and their access to {{APP_NAME}} has been restored. Here are the details:

Member ID: {{USER_ID}}
Member Email: {{USER_EMAIL}}
Member Phone: {{USER_PHONE_NUMBER}}
 
Please update the member's status in our system accordingly and ensure that they have full access to the facilities and services. It is essential to provide them with a smooth transition back into their regular membership privileges.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: [Admin] New Staff Welcome
subject: Welcome to {{APP_NAME}} - Your New Staff Account Details
content:
Dear {{ADMIN_FIRST_NAME}},

We are excited to welcome you to our team! Your new staff account has been created, and here are your login details:

Email: {{ADMIN_EMAIL}}
Password: {{PASSWORD}}

Please keep this information secure. You can log in using the provided credentials.
Login Now
If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact our support team.

Thank you for choosing to be a part of our organization. We look forward to working with you.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

label: [Admin] Contact Us Notification
subject: [{{APP_NAME}}] Enquiry #{{ENQUIRY_ID}} - Contact Us Submitted by {{USER_NAME}}
content:
Hi,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to inform you that we have received a new submission through our contact form. Below are the details of the submission:

Name: {{USER_NAME}}
Email: {{USER_EMAIL}}
Phone: {{USER_PHONE_NUMBER}}
Message: {{ENQUIRY_MESSAGE}}

Please take the necessary actions to follow up with the contact and address any inquiries or requests they may have submitted.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
{{APP_NAME}}

This email was sent through the general contact form.
